rubrics.rubric: Knee pain < walking or climbing stairs, > rest
rubrics.modality: Worse exertion, better immobility or firm pressure

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain < rising from sitting, squatting, toilet
rubrics.modality: Pain on rising or bending knees
rubrics.notes: Often seen in obesity, early OA, or weak musculature

rubrics.rubric: Pain in knees with swelling after exertion or trauma
rubrics.modality: History of injury, fall, or repetitive strain
rubrics.notes: Acute injury or overuse strain on ligaments/tendons

rubrics.rubric: Knee stiffness in morning or after rest, better by movement
rubrics.notes: Functional stiffness, early degenerative or overuse

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain associated with menses or hormonal fluctuation
rubrics.notes: Important in teenage girls, hormonal imbalance

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain in growing children or during adolescence
rubrics.notes: Growth spurts or vitamin D/calcium-related patterns

rubrics.rubric: Obesity-related knee pain in young or sedentary individuals
rubrics.modality: < prolonged standing or walking, > sitting or support
rubrics.notes: Weight-bearing mechanical stress type knee pain

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain alternating sides or shifting joints
rubrics.modality: Pain shifts side to side or knee to other joints
Feels like joint will give way
rubrics.notes: Seen in anxiety-prone or chronic fatigue states

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain in obese or sluggish patients with delayed growth or weak ligaments
rubrics.notes: Chronic nutritional & mechanical loading in joints

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain following suppression of skin eruptions, steroids or local treatments
rubrics.modality: History of eczema/steroid suppression → joint pains later
rubrics.notes: Suppressed discharge or toxin → joint layer

rubrics.rubric: Knee pains alternating with other complaints (skin, urine, periods)
rubrics.modality: Symptoms change location or alternate with other body systems
rubrics.notes: Important in migrating or shifting symptomatology

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain recurring after grief, humiliation, or suppressed emotion
rubrics.modality: Worse after emotional suppression or shock
rubrics.notes: Mind layer involvement leading to somatic expression

rubrics.rubric: Knee pain in children with delayed milestones or weak bones
rubrics.modality: During adolescence or delayed physical development

rubrics.rubric: Chronic knee pain in patients with family history of diabetes, arthritis, or obesity
rubrics.modality: No obvious injury; deep genetic load visible
rubrics.notes: Inherited miasmatic terrain causing deep-seated joint issues
